title: Can A Riot Member Change My Name?
body: It says J A Y C E T O P, I didnt know I could make the name without the spaces. But when I try to change my name to Jayce Top, it says its already taken (by me). So how do I fix it?

replies.body:
Ayyyy double check that name for me.
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

Thank you so much. Just got out of the hospital being in there for 5 days and came back to this. 

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
